00070 //
00071 // Type Definitions
00072 //
00073 typedef struct _errentry {
00074     SINGLE_LIST_ENTRY slist;            //error log stack link
00075     ERRID  ErrID;                       //globally unique error ID
00076     UNICODE_STRING unicodeStr;          //unicode string data
00077     ULONG  DataBlkType;                 //type of associated data
00078     ULONG  DataBlkLen;                  //length of associated data
00079     PVOID  DataBlk;                     //points to associated data
00080     GUID   MofGuid;                     //MOF Guid to describe data
00081 } ERRENTRY, *PERRENTRY;
00082 
00083 typedef struct _errthread {
00084     LIST_ENTRY list;                    //error thread chain
00085     LIST_ENTRY ErrLogListHead;          //points to error log nesting chain
00086     ULONG   ThreadKeyType;              //key type of error thread
00087     union {
00088         struct {
00089             PIRP  Irp;
00090             UCHAR MajorFunction;
00091             UCHAR MinorFunction;
00092             PVOID Arguments[4];
00093             PDEVICE_OBJECT TargetDevice;
00094         } IrpKey;
00095 
00096         struct {
00097             PKTHREAD ThreadID;
00098         } ThIDKey;
00099 
00100     } ThreadKey;
00101 } ERRTHREAD, *PERRTHREAD;
00102 
00103 typedef struct _errlog {
00104     ULONG             Signature;        //error log structure signature
00105     ULONG             ulFlags;          //log session flags
00106     LIST_ENTRY        list;             //error log nesting link
00107     SINGLE_LIST_ENTRY ErrStack;         //points to the error stack
00108     PERRTHREAD        ErrThread;        //points to associated error thread
00109     PERRINFO          ErrInfo;          //points to error info.
00110 } ERRLOG, *PERRLOG;
00111 
00112 #define SIG_ERRLOG              'GOLE'  //error log signature "ELOG"
00113 #define LOGF_INITMASK           0x00000000      //init flags mask
00114 
00115 typedef struct _savedata {
00116     ULONG      Signature;               //savedata signature
00117     LIST_ENTRY list;                    //chain savedata list
00118     PERRINFO   ErrInfo;                 //points to error info.
00119 } SAVEDATA, *PSAVEDATA;
00120 
00121 #define SIG_SAVEDATA            'TADE'  //saved error data signature "EDAT"
00122 
00123 typedef struct _errmodule {
00124     LIST_ENTRY  list;                   //error modules chain
00125     GUID        ComponentGuid;          //GUID of handler module
00126     ULONG       NumErrHandlers;         //number of handlers in the module
00127     PERRHANDLER HandlerTable[1];        //error handler table
00128 } ERRMODULE, *PERRMODULE;

00130 //
00131 // Private Function Prototypes
00132 //
00133 #define IoepGetErrStack(ErrLog)                         \
00134             CONTAINING_RECORD((ErrLog)->ErrStack.Next, ERRENTRY, slist)
00135 
00136 #define IoepGetNextErrEntry(ErrEntry)                   \
00137             (((ErrEntry)->slist.Next != NULL)?          \
00138                 CONTAINING_RECORD((ErrEntry)->slist.Next, ERRENTRY, slist): \
00139                 NULL)
